In 1920 he becomes a Soviet partisan, and helps the partisans fight for the Soviets against the occupying British army. After the trapper is shot, the army discovers an amulet that suggests he is a direct descendant of Genghis Khan. They find him still alive, so the army restores his health and plans to use him as the head of a puppet regime.
